message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I believe will be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you for $17,000.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your perspective.  While I'm willing to be flexible, I can't come down to $15,000 at this time.  How about we split the difference and I offer it to you for $16,000?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $15,500.
